summary: Branding updates to “MHS Habibur Blog” are implemented in header, footer, and siteConfig. Sitemap includes 5 blog post URLs for new slugs. However, the diff summary truncates `blogSampleFallback.ts`, so it’s not fully verifiable from provided evidence that `samplePosts` contains exactly 5 qualifying posts with required fields/content. Several additional unrequested changes appear (theme/style overhaul, Tailwind config, social icons/links, extra docs/assets changes).

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts` so `samplePosts` contains exactly 5 professional posts about Online Income and/or Digital Marketing, each with non-empty title/slug/excerpt/content and valid published timestamp.
missing_requirements.reason: The `blogSampleFallback.ts` content is truncated in the diff summary, showing only the first post and part of the second; this is insufficient evidence to confirm there are exactly 5 posts, that all 5 match the required topics, and that each includes the required non-empty fields and readable multi-paragraph content.

hallucinated_features.description: Theme/visual styling changes beyond title/branding and new post content (global CSS and Tailwind theme updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goal disallows changing site theme/colors/layout beyond what is required for title/branding and new post content; modifying global styles and Tailwind theme is not requested by REQ-11/12/13.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer expansion with social media icon section and additional “About/Quick Links/Connect” content.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-11/12/13; REQ-11 only requires copyright branding text update.
Not requested by REQ-11/12/13; REQ-13 only requires updating `frontend/public/sitemap.xml`.
